# Introduction

This book has been developed as a companion for the course Intro to Biological Systems Engineers at Virginia Tech, BSE2004. It is based on many different resources from the chemical and biological engineering fields (see Additional Resources below) and aims to develop many basic skills necessary for success as a biological systems engineer.
